channel.title: CVE Feed for narinder-singh -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for narinder-singh -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-4349|2024-08-03T17:23:10.714Z -- narinder-singh -- process%20steps%20template%20designer
item.description: The Process Steps Template Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.2.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to conduct unspecified attacks via forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2022-4950|2024-08-03T01:55:46.079Z -- narinder-singh -- the%20events%20calendar%20countdown%20addon
item.description: Several WordPress plugins developed by Cool Plugins are vulnerable to arbitrary plugin installation and activation that can lead to remote code execution by authenticated attackers with minimal permissions, such as a subscriber.

item.title: CVE-2021-4413|2024-08-03T17:23:10.711Z -- narinder-singh -- process%20steps%20template%20designer
item.description: The Process Steps Template Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.2.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the save() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save field icons via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-0977|2024-08-01T18:26:30.147Z -- narinder-singh -- timeline%20widget%20for%20elementor%20%28elementor%20timeline%2C%20vertical%20%26%20horizontal%20timeline%29
item.description: The Timeline Widget For Elementor (Elementor Timeline, Vertical & Horizontal Timeline) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via image URLs in the plugin's timeline widget in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page, changes the slideshow type, and then changes it back to an image.

item.title: CVE-2024-0977|2024-02-07T07:32:18.502Z -- narinder-singh -- timeline%20widget%20for%20elementor%20%28elementor%20timeline%2C%20vertical%20%26%20horizontal%20timeline%29
item.description: The Timeline Widget For Elementor (Elementor Timeline, Vertical & Horizontal Timeline) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via image URLs in the plugin's timeline widget in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page, changes the slideshow type, and then changes it back to an image.

item.title: CVE-2024-0977|2024-07-05T17:21:39.783Z -- narinder-singh -- timeline%20widget%20for%20elementor%20%28elementor%20timeline%2C%20vertical%20%26%20horizontal%20timeline%29
item.description: The Timeline Widget For Elementor (Elementor Timeline, Vertical & Horizontal Timeline) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via image URLs in the plugin's timeline widget in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page, changes the slideshow type, and then changes it back to an image.
